title: [FSX - P3DV1&2)] Aerosoft Thessaloniki X
description:
Thessaloniki X is not a standard scenery, it is a tour de force from some of the most talented scenery designers around. Of course the scenery is accurate but thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s just the technical part, what is far more amazing is how much this scenery Ã¢â‚¬ËœfeelsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ like one of those Greek airports that have calm winters and incredibly busy summers. 
  
  
There is a huge amount of small objects that prevent the rather common bleak and empty look of many airports in FS. The use of shadows and colors is spot on to give a real 3d sense the scenery. We especially love the way the airport looks at night as the detailed 3d lights add another dimension to an already stunning airport.

ItÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s how scenery of medium sized airports should be in 2014


Features:
Airport & City add-on for FSX and Prepar3D 
Fully detailed rendition of Thessaloniki Int`l Airport (LGTS) 
High resolution airport ground textures 
Thessaloniki city designed in full detail 
Photo-real terrain coverage of Thessaloniki 
3D night lighting 
Realistic shadow rendition on all 3D objects and ground 
Optimized scenery for high-end performance 
Realistic custom-made terrain mesh 
Fully compatible with all major Traffic add-ons 
Local apron and road traffic fully animated by AESLite 
AES 2.34 fully covers this airport (one credit) 
Scenery manager and AESLite traffic tools included 
Full manual included 
No online activation required

System requirements:
Microsoft Flight Simulator X (SP2, Acceleration Pack or Gold Edition) or Lockheed Martin Prepar3D (v1 or v2*)
Windows XP, Windows VISTA, Windows 7, Windows 8 (Windows 7 64 bits recommended)
3,0 GHz processor (Dual Core processor recommended)
4 GB RAM 
3D Graphics Card with minimal 1024 MB
Download-Size: 1 GB
Installations-Size: 1.5 GB

* there a few limitations with lights in Prepar3D v2, we are waiting for the planned update from Lockheed to solve those.


Developer:  FSDG 



Enjoy, 

and happy landings!
